skills.skill: Technical Experience in Aviation Supply Chain

duties_responsibilities.duty: Research and plan spare parts provisioning for Customer Service needs.
Organize kits/materials to ensure timely compliance of Service Bulletin and fleet upgrades/campaigns.
Prepare and plan for life limited parts and forecast their replacement.
Prepare, execute, and maintain project plans, schedules, tasks, and reports.
Support Parts Sales, Service Centers, and direct customers with planning and provisioning efforts.
Develop methodologies to support material planning responsibly.
Monitor open order lists and communicate priorities to Supply Chain team.
Assist Supply Chain in inventory planning by monitoring usage trends and forecasting future needs.
Participate in scheduled material planning meetings.
Review CMMs, AMM, IPD, and SRM and plan accordingly to support revisions of these manuals.
Coordinate efforts with Supply Chain and Stans Material Planning to schedule material deliveries.
Coordinate with Tech Support on material planning requirements.
Maintain and update recommended spare parts lists for new Service Centers and fleet customers.

education_certification.credential: BS or BA degree or equivalent combination of education and related experience in aviation. (Pilatus PC-12 and PC-24 knowledge preferred)
